item.title: Retriever
item.description: The AWS SDK is great. Writing boilerplate for simple tasks is… Well, you have better things to do. Whether creating CLIs or services, one task I routinely encounter is secrets management. With AWS, I might use Secrets Manager (advanced features such as versioning simplify programmatic rotation) or Parameter Store (cost savings at scale, works great for injecting container environment). I find myself repeating boilerplate (load configuration, create client, retrieve secret):
